text: 12.33 1 Sml 15.22, Ais 45.21, Hos 6.6, Mai 6.6-8, Mat 22.37, Luk 10.27 Chɨn God nop tap dam ñɨnɨgabun akaŋ, sɨbog ñɨnɨgabun ak tap yokɨp ak pen, mapen chɨn ak, gos tɨmud chɨn ak, kɨles chɨn ak, mɨdupsek nop yɨl amek nop mapen yɨbɨl lɨl, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop chɨn ke mapen lɨpun tek gɨnɨgabun ak, tap awl yɨbɨl agak.
